original_title: Health Minister raises concerns over shortage of drugs in central storage
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella has expressed concern over a shortage of 190 types of drugs in central drug storage.The minister made these remarks at the President's Media Centre.

In addition, the Minister of Health stated that efforts are underway to address the situation, and by the end of this year, the country aims to produce 20 types of medicines domestically, reducing dependence on imports.
